Fetch Quarterly Data from BDDK Finturk with Multiple Provinces

Source: R/fetch_finturk.R
fetch_finturk1.Rd

Retrieves quarterly banking data from the BDDK Finturk API for specified group codes and provinces. Supports multiple group codes and province codes in a single request.

Usage

fetch_finturk1(year, month, table_no, grup_kod = 10001, il = 0)

Arguments

year

Year as 4-digit integer (YYYY).

month

Month as integer (3,6,9,12 for quarterly data).

table_no

Table number to fetch (1-7). No default.

grup_kod

Group code (10001-1007). Default 10001.

il

plaka (license plate) number (0-81); 999 = Yurt Dışı. Default 0. 0=HEPSİ (All Cities), 1=Adana, 6=Ankara, 34=İstanbul, 35=İzmir, etc. See list_cities for full list.

Value

Data frame with a fetch_info attribute that contains query details.

Details

The Finturk API only provides data for quarter-ending months (March, June, September, December). Province codes follow Turkey's standard license plate numbering (1 = Adana, 6 = Ankara, 34 = İstanbul, etc.).

See also

fetch_bddk1() for monthly data without province granularity.

Examples

# Single group, all provinces
fetch_finturk1(2020, 3, 1, grup_kod = 10001)
#>    grup_kod  Yıl Ay         il_adi   Grup Toplam Nakdi Krediler Nakdi Krediler

# Multiple groups and specific provinces
fetch_finturk1(2020, 3, 1, grup_kod = c(10006, 10007), il = c(6, 34))
#>   grup_kod  Yıl Ay   il_adi       Grup Toplam Nakdi Krediler Nakdi Krediler
#> 1    10006 2020  3   ANKARA       KAMU             185526778      179525050
#> 2    10007 2020  3   ANKARA YERLİ ÖZEL             136289459      128976219
#> 3    10006 2020  3 İSTANBUL       KAMU             455596797      441325761
#> 4    10007 2020  3 İSTANBUL YERLİ ÖZEL             399206957      374614488
#>   Takipteki Alacaklar Gayrinakdi Krediler plaka  period table_no
#> 1             6001728            84647464     6 2020-03        1
#> 2             7313240            45564504     6 2020-03        1
#> 3            14271036           157266637    34 2020-03        1
#> 4            24592469           137339485    34 2020-03        1

# Single group, single province
fetch_finturk1(2020, 3, 1, grup_kod = 10001, il = 34)
#>   grup_kod  Yıl Ay   il_adi   Grup Toplam Nakdi Krediler Nakdi Krediler
#> 1    10001 2020  3 İSTANBUL SEKTÖR            1202302773     1140923183
#>   Takipteki Alacaklar Gayrinakdi Krediler plaka  period table_no
#> 1            61379590           398207110    34 2020-03        1
